meanings: build, (건물·시설 등의) [명사] construction, building, [동사] construct, (formal) erect
be under[in the course of] construction

vlive.korean: 건설업체... A construction company. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] KIMJAEJOONG X LieV - 김재중의 눕방라이브!

날림 건설이면 우리나라 최고 건설 업계 회사 아니에요? Isn't Nallim Construction the greatest construction company in our country? 듣기 View video 달핑스튜디오 : [도시의 밤,별] EP.05 남자가 집에 데려다 주는 이유

vlive.korean: 장훈 님도 날림 건설이 좋아서 지원하신 거 아니에요? Didn't you apply because you really like Nallim Construction? 듣기 View video 달핑스튜디오 : [도시의 밤,별] EP.05 남자가 집에 데려다 주는 이유
vlive.english: Didn't you apply because you really like Nallim Construction?

vlive.korean: 우리 썸냐들과 같이 살 나라를 건설하고 있었어요. I was building the land that I'm going to live in with InSomnia. 듣기 View video DREAMCATCHER : [Replay] 드림캐쳐(Dreamcatcher) COMEBACK SHOWCASE
vlive.english: I was building the land that I'm going to live in with InSomnia.

examples.korean: The building project will be financed by the government. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 건설 사업에는 정부가 재원을 댈 것이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The building project will be financed by the government. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The housing projects are subsidized by the government. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 주택 건설 프로젝트는 정부 보조금을 받는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The housing projects are subsidized by the government. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They have built hotels in the most unlikely places. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 대단히 예상 밖의 장소들에 호텔을 건설해 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They have built hotels in the most unlikely places. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The industry is coeval with the construction of the first railways. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 산업은 첫 철도 건설과 같은 시기에 시작되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The industry is coeval with the construction of the first railways. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The commission intervened and commanded that work on the building cease. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 위원단이 개입하여 그 건설 공사를 중단할 것을 지시했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The commission intervened and commanded that work on the building cease. Add to Wordbook
